title: How to Make Floating Hearts from Plastic Straws

steps.headline: Stretch two straws so that the bending part is elongated.
Cut off the short ends of the straws to about half an inch (1 or 2 cm).
Hold the cut ends together with pliers and seal them together with a flame.
Cut the other ends of the straws to about 2 inches (5 cm) depending on how "tall" you want the heart to be.
Bend the straws in the opposite direction, as shown.
Hold the ends together with pliers and seal them together with a flame.
Put the heart in a drink and, if you want, tie a ring to it with a piece of string so that when someone lifts out the heart, they find it!

text: Stretch two straws so that the bending part is elongated.  Cut off the short ends of the straws to about half an inch (1 or 2 cm).  Hold the cut ends together with pliers and seal them together with a flame.  Cut the other ends of the straws to about 2 inches (5 cm) depending on how "tall" you want the heart to be.  Bend the straws in the opposite direction, as shown.  Hold the ends together with pliers and seal them together with a flame.  Put the heart in a drink and, if you want, tie a ring to it with a piece of string so that when someone lifts out the heart, they find it! The heart is complete!
